name: FInputDeviceRay
doc:
FInputDeviceRay represents a 3D ray created based on an input device.
If the device is a 2D input device like a mouse, then the ray may
have an associated 2D screen position.

WorldRay: 3D ray in 3D scene, in world coordinates
bHas2D: If true, WorldRay has 2D device position coordinates
ScreenPosition: 2D device position coordinates associated with the ray
